SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS studycnt FROM( SELECT DISTINCT s.s_num, s.userId, created, studyName , study_Info, gender, recruit, range, imageFilename, userName , userImg FROM study s JOIN member m ON s.userId = m.userId JOIN studyCategory sc ON s.s_num = sc.s_num JOIN s_category category ON sc.choicecategory = category.categorynum JOIN studyTarget st ON s.s_num = st.s_num JOIN studyLocal sl ON s.s_num = sl.s_num WHERE s.s_num > 0
)
